mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.url, a.code, a.remark from boot_sys_resource a where a.id = #{id}
select a.resource_id as id, a.title, a.url, a.status, a.code, a.remark, a.process_instance_id from boot_sys_resource_audit a where a.resource_id = #{id} order by create_date desc limit 1
select id,title,`code`,`remark`,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d') as ymd from boot_sys_resource where del_flag = 0 and `code` = #{code}
select count(1) from boot_sys_resource where del_flag = 0 and `code` = #{code}
